description:
| The quality of a project document makes or breaks the image of a
  project. A document (be it a release note, or just a usage guideline)
  is the first thing one gives a user before even selling the idea of
  the project.
| This session is for all those people who have a great project and want
  to learn how to create a greater impact through documentation.


| -Why documentation? What is in it for me? -How to plan, start,
  structure and write an effective document? -Use cases
| -Tips and Tricks for making an everlasting impact and immediate
  connect with the user
title: Create an impact with "Good Documentation"
